history.content:
Hiring for most classes happened a month ago, so your odds are probably not good at this point. You can email the course staff and ask them this question. Lower divs rarely hire people straight out, but upperdivs sometimes do.

----

The short answer is yes it's possible to do so, but your probability of success is not super high. For more instructions about applying to data science course staff, refer to the Data 001 Piazza. Note that the priority deadline was around the beginning of October. - Ishaan

Hiring for most classes happened a month ago, so your odds are probably not good at this point. You can email the course staff and ask them this question. Lower divs rarely hire people straight out, but upperdivs sometimes do.
I want to apply to be a Data100 tutor for next semester but I'm still taking the class right now, is it possible to get the position if I haven't finished taking the class?
history.subject: Can I apply to course staff positions before I finish taking the class?
